area.key: To import a group of settings, choose a '.usync' file from your computer and then select 'import' you will then be able to check and import the contents of the file to this umbraco instance
Export this item and all its dependencies as a sing 'sync-pack' file. this file can then be taken to another umbraco instance and will install everything needed to recreate this item
Import / Export Groups of Settings / Content
If you have a sync-pack you can import it by using the button below.
You can create packs by right-clicking on a tree item and selecting 'export to Sync-Pack' or you can create a custom pack below
When you include an item, all its dependencies will also be included e.g you don't need to pick the datatypes for a content item
The following items are in the sync pack
You are ready to create a sync pack
Your sync-pack is complete, you should now be prompted to download it.
